response.overview: Ellie, a young babysitter looking to earn a bit of extra money, is hired to take care of a young child in a house for the evening. Ellie quickly discovers that this house isn't all it seems to be, with dark secrets lurking around each and every corner. With terrifying scares and unnerving revelations, Ellie soon realises that it is no coincidence she has found herself in this house. Tonight of all nights, Ellie wishes she was anywhere but here.
response.title: Abaddon
